timeline.author: dhaggart

timeline.bodyText: Do you not want to remove trailing whitespace on all lines?
timeline.author: dhaggart
joe-chacko

timeline.bodyText:
Since expirable is a parameter and can't be modified by another thread, there is no reason to place the AtomicBoolean.get() first — it forces a JVM memory read barrier but this can't affect the value of the next check in the logical conjunction.
If expirable is likely to be null, perhaps we should test that first, and avoid any additional expense?
timeline.author: joe-chacko
